unnormalised: Okay, folks, settle in with your chai because the Bollywood goss is brewing HOT today!
normalised: Okay, folks, settle in with your chai because the Bollywood goss is brewing hot today!

unnormalised: First off, word on the street (and by street, I mean Filmfare and Reddit) is that Ranbir and Alia might be expecting baby number two! Remember how crazy everyone went over Raha? Can you imagine the frenzy this time? Sources close to the couple (aka the building watchman, probably) are saying Alia has been avoiding red carpets and favoring flowy anarkalis. Coincidence? I think NOT.
normalised: First off, word on the street (and by street, I mean Filmfare and Reddit) is that Ranbir and Alia might be expecting baby number two! Remember how crazy everyone went over Raha? Can you imagine the frenzy this time? Sources close to the couple (aka the building watchman, probably) are saying Alia has been avoiding red carpets and favoring flowy anarkalis. Coincidence? I think not.

unnormalised: Next up, is there trouble in paradise for Deepika and Ranveer? A blind item on Pinkvilla suggested a power couple is on the verge of a split, and the internet sleuths went WILD. Someone even dug up a tweet from 2015 where Ranveer said he eats biryani with his hands. What does that have to do with anything? Absolutely nothing, but try telling that to the Twitterati! Their next joint appearance will be heavily scrutinized, bet your bottom rupee.
normalised: Next up, is there trouble in paradise for Deepika and Ranveer? A blind item on Pinkvilla suggested a power couple is on the verge of a split, and the internet sleuths went wild. Someone even dug up a tweet from two thousand and fifteen where Ranveer said he eats biryani with his hands. What does that have to do with anything? Absolutely nothing, but try telling that to the Twitterati! Their next joint appearance will be heavily scrutinized, bet your bottom rupee.

unnormalised: And can we talk about Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas' vacation pictures from Goa? Talk about couple goals! But seriously, can I afford that swimsuit she's wearing? Probably not. My salary is barely enough to cover my monthly Netflix subscription, let alone designer swimwear.
normalised: And can we talk about Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas' vacation pictures from Goa? Talk about couple goals! But seriously, can I afford that swimsuit she's wearing? Probably not. My salary is barely enough to cover my monthly Netflix subscription, let alone designer swimwear.

unnormalised: Finally, a little birdie (my mom’s neighbor who works as a makeup artist) told me that Katrina Kaif and Vicky Kaushal are planning a massive Diwali bash at their new Juhu bungalow. Apparently, everyone from Karan Johar to Ananya Pandey is on the guest list. Expect lots of blurry pap photos and questionable dance moves. I'm already preparing my “stunning” outfit – a borrowed saree and a whole lot of hope. Stay tuned for more updates! Don't forget to follow for more Bollywood masala! Is this the end? Only time will tell!
